name: Meal Quest
description:
Developer: Rafael Dominique B. Aure (2022)
Adviser: Lawrence Joseph T. Paculan

Synopsis:
Haggy sets up a new mobile eatery in a country unknown to him. Meeting Melori that is away from his home, he offered to accompany her back to her village but she has to work for him. We follow their adventure as Melori is introduced to delicious dishes she is unfamiliar to.
